attributes.action: Allow a short break for families traveling on holiday during school term.
attributes.additional_details: Our request is motivated by the fact that we want to spend time together with children.  Most parents work even when their children are half term.  The second also important reason is that the costs of holidays during Half term are much higher than when traveling during the school term.
attributes.background: On behalf of the parents, we ask you to lift penalties for parents who go on a short holiday during school term (please excuse up to 5 days during the year).

rejection.details:
We have published the following petition, which you might like to sign:

Allow school children 5 days of absence: for family, holidays & mental wellbeing: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/632846

Scrap fines for taking children out of school in term time: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/631546
